Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to signage for automatic doors

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on the results of lotteries administered by the department of housing preservation and development for affordable housing units for tenants with disabilities
Items.MatterName: Reporting on the results of lotteries administered by the department of housing preservation and development for affordable housing units for tenants with disabilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a developer receiving city financial assistance to incorporate universal design features in dwelling units offered for rent in a housing development project
Items.MatterName: Aging In Place Package - Requiring a developer receiving city financial assistance to incorporate universal design features in dwelling units offered for rent in a housing development project.
